title: Language Learning Adventure Game Design Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A gamified learning environment for practicing professionals to improve work-integrated language proficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can perform learning tasks while maintaining 85% or higher concentration using background music in an educational adventure game.
Learners can accurately use over 50 beginner-level language expressions in context-specific scenarios through in-game quest resolution processes.
Learners can achieve 90% or higher comprehension in communication with peer learners through in-game cooperative missions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
